content: the easy does it hat pattern is the perfect solution for new crocheters looking to create a practical stylish and cozy winter accessory this project requires minimal materials only one ball of bulky weight yarn and takes less than two hours to complete plus the pattern can be used to make hats for anyone from preemies to adults my post will walk you through the steps needed to crochet the easy does it hat pattern from the materials you ll need to the simple stitches and helpful tips before you know it you ll have a beautiful hat that you can show off to family and friends so grab your crochet hook and get ready to craft something warm and cozy for yourself or your loved ones with the easy does it hat pattern the yarn used for this project was given to me by knitpal yarn needed
